name: Beckhoff Automation GmbH & Co. KG
goal: Beckhoff implements open automation systems based on PC Control technology. The product range covers Industrial PCs, I/O and Fieldbus Components, Drive Technology and automation software. Products that can be used as separate components or integrated into a complete and seamless control system are available for all industries. The Beckhoff “New Automation Technology” philosophy represents universal and open control and automation solutions that are used worldwide in a wide variety of different applications, ranging from CNC-controlled machine tools to intelligent building automation.
interests: Business and Industry, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Following legal regulations and state of affair in Research and Development
